main.name: Agustín Gregorieu
main.description: I enjoy working in challenging software projects.
main.bio:
Hello! My name is Agustín Gregorieu and I'm an Information Systems Engineer who likes traveling, I'm looking for jobs abroad related to the software development. I have worked exclusively on projects oriented towards the web environment. I have experience using several tools as you will be able to appreciate in the ''skills'' section, most of them related to Web Development. 
 I have the need to emphasize that although I'm young and I have lack of experience in some technologies, I'm a very quick and enthusiastic learner. I consider myself to be a proactive and analytical person. I'm fully dedicated to the service, and I'm highly interested in learning and updating my knowledge about the market’s new tendencies and new technologies.

education.description: I attended Machine Learning classes at UMass for about 6 weeks.
Completed and graduated with the Information Systems Engineer degree at the UTN of Córdoba.
Bachelor at the secondary school where I studied.

projects.title: SmartMonitor
projects.description:
SmartMonitor consists of a customizable tool that allows people to monitor several critical aspects related to their business. For example, you can monitor the state of your servers, their disk space available, how some processes are working, gather data from your databases to show information you really need, among other things that need to be constantly followed. 
The technologies used are: JS, HTML+CSS, Lazarus/FreePascal, Python, PostgreSQL and ShellScripts.

projects.title: imTranscript
projects.description:
imTranscript is a tool that allows transcriptionists to manage and follow the transcription assignations. The idea is that a coordinator can assign to the transcriptionists studies that need to be transcripted. The transcriptionist will be able to access their studies, listen to the doctor's record, and transcript the study, among many other features. 
The technologies used are: JS, HTML+CSS, Lazarus/FreePascal, and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: PriHood
projects.description:
PriHood was my Information Systems Engineering thesis project, the idea was to develop an hybrid mobile app capable of automating several processes of the life in private neighborhoods. As a resident you are able to share your trip by car (car pooling), to book amenities, to emit alerts in case of robberies or emergencies, to create events, and many other very useful functionalities. 
The technologies used were: Ionic, Angular, C# and MySQL. 
 You can see this project in my GitHub account.

testimonials.text: We used Henri to take images on our behalf for a recent multi-million pound project. He completely understood the brief and his shots were well taken, striking and wonderfully framed. Henri is a punctual, polite and trustworthy individual who I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend to others as we will definitely be using him for future projects. He is a pleasure to work with.

We approached Henri with an 11th hour request to photograph a building we had just re-branded. We were on a very tight deadline to produce the promotional material, ready for a launch party the following week. Henri was incredibly accommodating, and made himself available for the following day The photographs were excellent and met with the client’s approval, so much so that he also became the photographer for the launch event! Henri is highly personable and professional and I have no hesitation in recommending him.
